snippet.title: Assassin's Creed 2 gets November release date
snippet.description: ...While it's been no secret that Assassin's Creed 2 is in the works, little has been known about the game until now. At the Ubisoft press conference, a new trailer was shown and Ubi has announced an official release date for the title.At the conference yesterday, a new trailer for the sequel to Assassin's Creed showcased the 15th Century Venice setting and Altair's replacement, ...

snippet.title: Official explanation of controversial Assassin's Creed 2 DRM
snippet.description: ...Ubisoft has long had some controversial ideas about how DRM should be used, but when PC Gamer was given a review copy of Assassin's Creed 2 on the PC it seemed as if the reality was going to be much worse than what opponents to DRM had feared: the game requires an always-on 'Net connection and constant communication with the home server. If your connection is dropped, the game kicks you...

snippet.title: Did Ubisoft pirate its own soundtrack for Assassin's Creed: Brotherhood PC?
snippet.description: ...Assassin's Creed: Brotherhood is finally coming to the PC later this month, after hitting consoles last November. To make amends, the publisher is releasing a digital deluxe version of the game, complete with a wide range of extras, including a copy of the game's soundtrack. The problem? It looks like that soundtrack may actually be a torrented version.As one Reddit user discovered afte...
